properties.name: brands
properties.description: Array of card brands that will be recognized. For a list of possible values, refer to [Supported card types](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#supported-card-types).

properties.name: brandsConfiguration
properties.description: Object where you can customize the icons for different brands.

properties.name: showBrandIcon
properties.description: Set to false to not show the brand logo when the card brand has been recognized.

properties.name: showBrandsUnderCardNumber
properties.description: Shows brand logos under the card number field when the shopper selects the card payment method.

properties.name: enableStoreDetails
properties.description: Set to true to show the checkbox for saving the card details for recurring payments.

properties.name: hasHolderName
properties.description: Set to true to show the input field for the cardholder name.

properties.name: holderNameRequired
properties.description: Set to true to make the cardholder name a required field. To show the field, you additionally need to set `hasHolderName` to true

properties.name: positionHolderNameOnTop
properties.description: Renders the cardholder name field at the top of the payment form.

properties.name: hideCVC
properties.description: Set to true to hide the CVC field.

properties.name: configuration.socialSecurityNumberMode
properties.description: Renders a social security number field. For example, this is required for certain card payments in Brazil. Possible values are: show, hide, auto

properties.name: styles
properties.description: Set a style object to customize the card input fields. For a list of supported properties, refer to [Styling card input fields](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#styling).

properties.name: billingAddressRequired
properties.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

properties.name: billingAddressAllowedCountries
properties.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Object that contains placeholder information that you can use to prefill fields

properties.name: installmentOptions
properties.description: If you want to offer credit card installments, specify here the numbers of monthly installments that the shopper can choose from.

properties.name: showInstallmentAmounts
properties.description: If you want to offer credit card installments, set to true to show the payment amount per installment.

properties.name: minimumExpiryDate
properties.description: If a shopper enters a date that is earlier than specified here, they will see the following error:'Your card expires before check out date.'

properties.name: autoFocus
properties.description: Automatically move the focus from date field to the CVC field.

properties.name: SRConfig
properties.description: Object for configuring screen reader behavior. Does not affect what gets rendered in the checkout form.

properties.name: collateErrors
properties.description: Indicates if all errors in the form are read out after each validation. For example, if there is an error in the card number field, the error is read out after validating each of the other fields, until the error is fixed.

properties.name: moveFocus
properties.description: Indicates if focus automatically switches to the first field with an error when the shopper selects the Pay button. Can only be set if SRConfig.collateErrors is true

properties.name: enableStoreDetails
properties.description: Set to true to show the checkbox for saving the card details for recurring payments.

properties.name: enableStoreDetails
properties.description: Set to true to show the checkbox for saving the card details for recurring payments.

properties.name: hasHolderName
properties.description: Set to true to show the input field for the cardholder name.

properties.name: holderNameRequired
properties.description: Set to true to make the cardholder name a required field. To show the field, you additionally need to set `hasHolderName` to true

properties.name: holderName
properties.description: String that is used to prefill the cardholder name field.

properties.name: positionHolderNameOnTop
properties.description: Renders the cardholder name field at the top of the payment form.

properties.name: name
properties.description: String that is used to display the payment method name to the shopper.

properties.name: styles
properties.description: Set a style object to customize the card input fields. For a list of supported properties, refer to [Styling card input fields](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#styling).

properties.name: minimumExpiryDate
properties.description: If a shopper enters a date that is earlier than specified here, they will see the following error:'Your card expires before check out date.'

properties.name: brands
properties.description: Array of card brands that will be recognized. For a list of possible values, refer to [Supported card types](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#supported-card-types).

properties.name: brandsConfiguration
properties.description: Object where you can customize the icons for different brands.

properties.name: showBrandIcon
properties.description: Set to false to not show the brand logo when the card brand has been recognized.

properties.name: showBrandsUnderCardNumber
properties.description: Shows brand logos under the card number field when the shopper selects the card payment method.

properties.name: billingAddressRequired
properties.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

properties.name: billingAddressAllowedCountries
properties.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Object that contains placeholder information that you can use to prefill fields

properties.name: autoFocus
properties.description: Automatically move the focus from date field to the CVC field.

properties.name: SRConfig
properties.description: Object for configuring screen reader behavior. Does not affect what gets rendered in the checkout form.

properties.name: SRConfig.collateErrors
properties.description: Indicates if all errors in the form are read out after each validation. For example, if there is an error in the card number field, the error is read out after validating each of the other fields, until the error is fixed.

properties.name: SRConfig.moveFocus
properties.description: Indicates if focus automatically switches to the first field with an error when the shopper selects the Pay button. Can only be set if SRConfig.collateErrors is true

properties.name: personalDetailsRequired
properties.description: Set to false if you have already collected the shopper's first name, last name, and CPF/CNPJ (socialSecurityNumber)

properties.name: billingAddressRequired
properties.description: Set this to false if you have already collected the shopper's street, house number or name, city, postal code, and state or province.

properties.name: showEmailAddress
properties.description: Set this to false if you have already collected the shopper's email address.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Object to pre-fill shopper details on the form

properties.name: personalDetailsRequired
properties.description: Set to false to hide the input fields for shopper name, email, and telephone number

properties.name: showImage
properties.description: Set to false to remove the bank logos from the Online banking Czech Republic form.

properties.name: issuer
properties.description: Set to an Online banking Czech Republic issuer ID to preselect a specific bank.

properties.name: highlightedIssuers
properties.description: Set to the Online banking Czech Republic issuer IDs for banks you want to show on top of the dropdown menu. Added in v5.1.0

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: String to show for the dropdown menu text. Custom translation configuration overrides this value.

properties.name: highlightedIssuers
properties.description: Set to the Online banking Malaysia issuer IDs for banks you want to show on top of the dropdown menu. Added in v5.1.0

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: String to show for the dropdown menu text. Custom translation configuration overrides this value.
